= Framework =

This message on start is known to appear not only when you've no appropriate .NET Framework version but when you lost config file (Yasc.exe.config) from the installation archive too. 

[http://shogi-game.googlecode.com/svn/site/UpdateForFramework.png]

Though you've must just have forgotten to setup .NET Framework. If you don't know what is it I'm telling you it's from Microsoft (the guys developed Windows operating system) and you hsould get it here: [http://tinyurl.com/9bd8he Microsoft .NET Framework Client Profile Online Installer]. Make sure to read instructions carefully.

If you know what you're ding here are few more links:
  # [http://tinyurl.com/akd869 Microsoft .NET Framework Client Profile Offline Installer
]. Althogh it's approximately 10 tines bigger then what bootstraper is going to download you'll have installer on your drive.
